documentation.text:
@dev Converts a fixed point fraction to a denormalized weight.
 Multiply the fraction by the max weight and decode to an unsigned integer.

documentation.text:
@dev Converts a fixed point fraction to a denormalized weight.
 Multiply the fraction by the max weight and decode to an unsigned integer.

deployIndexPool(uint256,uint256,string,s.details: Deploy a new indexed pool with the category ID and index size. TODO: Currently this just assumes that the pool controller already owns the tokens. This should be updated to gradually purchase tokens from UniSwap.

params.indexSize: Number of tokens to hold in the index fund
params.initialStablecoinValue: Total initial value of the pool
params.name: Name of the index token - should indicate the category and size

getInitialTokenWeightsAndBalances(uint25.details: Queries the top n tokens in a category from the market oracle, computes their relative weights by market cap square root and determines the weighted balance of each token to meet a specified total value.

reweighPool(address).details: Reweighs the assets in a pool by market cap and sets the desired new weights, which will be adjusted over time.
